name: $preparation
desc: The dispense has started but has not yet completed.

name: $in-progress
desc: Actions implied by the administration have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later. May also be called "suspended"

name: $on-hold
desc: All actions that are implied by the dispense have occurred.

name: $completed
desc: The dispense was entered in error and therefore nullified.

name: $entered-in-error
desc: Actions implied by the dispense have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.
